comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Amongst the activites arranged for the shore visit in Sydney by the sailors of the Genera Baquedano during this visit were a couple of boxing matches at the noted boxing venue, the Stadium. The Sydney Morning Herald of Friday 24 July 1931 describes two upcoming bouts at the stadium. Victor Reyes - v- Keith Tange and Hector Villaroel - v - (opponent yet to be named) Maybe the pubilist in this photo is Reyes or Villaroel. [ ref. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article28040530 ]

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/lifeasdaddy] Thanks for the article BobMeade! How fascinating. Though wouldn't it be great if we could establish for certain who this man was? Thank you again for pointing out the article.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
